sentences.en: He sat on a tapestry cushion next to the hearth.
sentences.cn: 他坐在壁炉边上的一块绣花软垫上。

sentences.en: His landing was cushioned by the fresh snow that had fallen.
sentences.cn: 他落地时刚下的雪起到了缓冲作用。

sentences.en: Lie face upwards with a cushion under your head.
She embroidered flowers on the cushion covers.
sentences.cn: 她在这些靠垫套上绣了花。

sentences.en: She made a cushion out of odd bits of material.
sentences.cn: 她用碎布头做了个靠垫.

sentences.en: She sank gracefully down onto a cushion at his feet.
sentences.cn: 她优雅地坐到他脚旁的垫子上.

sentences.en: She sat there, reclined against a foam rubber cushion.
sentences.cn: 她在那儿倚靠着海绵橡胶垫坐着.

sentences.en: Tack the cord around the cushion.
sentences.cn: 用粗线沿着垫子边绷一圈。

sentences.en: The bush acted as a cushion to my fall.
sentences.cn: 矮树丛缓冲了我的下跌。

sentences.en: The cat huddled itself on the cushion.
sentences.cn: 猫将身子缩成一团睡在椅垫上.

sentences.en: The company provides a styrofoam cushion to protect the tablets during shipping.
sentences.cn: 该公司用泡沫塑料包住牌匾，以防止其在运输过程中受损。

sentences.en: The kitten was curled on a cushion on the sofa.
sentences.cn: 那只小猫在沙发垫子上蜷缩成了一团。

sentences.en: The subsidies are designed to cushion farmers against unpre-dictable weather.
sentences.cn: 这些补助金用于减轻农民因难以预测的恶劣天气而遭受的损失。

sentences.en: The suspension is designed to cushion passengers from the effects of riding over rough roads.
sentences.cn: 汽车的悬架装置是用来减轻行驶在崎岖路面时乘客的颠簸感的。

sentences.en: There is also a new steering wheel with an energy absorbing rim to cushion the driver's head in the worst impacts.
sentences.cn: 还配有轮缘部分具有减震功能的新型方向盘，以在受到严重撞击时保护司机的头部。

phrases.tran_cn: 给垫着点儿；说话绵软一点以免打击过重

trans.tran_cn: 垫子，起保护(或缓冲)作用的事物
trans.tran_en: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put on a chair or the floor to make it more comfortable

trans.tran_cn: 减少对…的震动/冲击，减轻(令人不快的影响)
trans.tran_en: to make the effect of a fall or hit less painful, for example by having something soft in the way
